original_text: Apollos went to the Jewish meeting place and he taught the people there. He was not afraid to speak God's message to them. Priscilla and Aquila heard what Apollos was teaching the people. So they said to him, ‘Please come with us to our home.’ Then they explained to Apollos the whole of God's message about Jesus. Then he could understand better.
korean_text: 그가 회당에서 담대히 말하기 시작하거늘 브리스길라와 아굴라가 듣고 데려다가 하나님의 도를 더 정확하게 풀어 이르더라

sentences.original_text: Apollos went to the Jewish meeting place
and he taught the people there
to speak God's message to them
what Apollos was teaching the people
Please come with us to our home
sentences.korean_translation: 제발 우리와 함께 우리 집에 오세요

sentences.original_text: the whole of God's message about Jesus

sentences.korean_translation: 그러자 그는 더 잘 이해할 수 있었습니다
